website_summaries.verdict: This is a good budget pick if you want a derailleur that works without being too flashy..
pros: Installation is straightforward and takes about 30 minutes
Made of lightweight aluminum instead of heavy steel
Works well on a variety of bikes and configurations
cons: When on the softest gear, it has a tendency to touch the spoke

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and very functional
customer_reviews.text: I was repairing some neighborhood bikes so I bought a few of these and crossed my fingers. They work great, shift smooth and seem pretty bulletproof for the cost. Honestly, I cannot find a problem with these other than they look inexpensive. If you want some eye candy, then you need to pungle up some more money for a cooler item (I do for my bikes), but if you just need something to work well for the foreseeable future, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, but it does what it needs to get done, as long as you don't bend it.
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy a second one since the bike trailer I was using got caught onto the derailer, it bent this derailer, so hint, don't bend it. But it does work with the 41T rear cog, so I can drag my new surly bill trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement!
customer_reviews.text: 08/13/15 used for replacement of stock derailleur (earlier model) Tourney replacement with a short cage on MOTOBECANE MIRAGE S; also bought a new chain; got the long cage and was able to remove some links from the new chain for proper fit; derailleur adjusted & road tested ; I don't know if it was both the chain & new derailleur or just one but it is virtually silent when pedaling and shifting is smooth; great buy! LOOKS GREAT TOO!
customer_reviews.author: BobCatTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Shimano shifters.
customer_reviews.text: Decided to go with this derailleur because was thinking of using a Mega Range gear. Ended up changing to a smaller size freewheel and this derailleur works much better/ smoother then the Sram 4.0 that came with my bike. Remember to have Shimano shifters to have proper ratio.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Villasenor

customer_reviews.title: ripped apart on second ride
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps it was my own fault for a stick getting sucked up in the derailleur. If you only ride easy packed gravel double track, you'd be fine. But don't expect this to hold up for rough trail
customer_reviews.author: eric Krieg

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what's wrong
customer_reviews.text: It was installed professionally by Dicks but it skips two gears....
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Perfect again
customer_reviews.text: This product was perfect and very simple to install and once again completely satisfied with Amazon's order and delivery process. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Elgin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and adjust
customer_reviews.text: Shifts better than the original. Easy to install and adjust. I work on a lot of bikes and this unit is tried and true on the older bikes I work on and this new unit did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Wrong part for my bike
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a pretty sturdy part, evene though its inexpensive. Didnt fix the bike i was trying to put it on, so i had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul3Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Product a Bit Difficult For Average Repair Person
customer_reviews.text: This product was great but not easy to install as there are no visual instructions. Had to utilize a You Tube video that had a similar product.
customer_reviews.author: Jonnathan

customer_reviews.title: Part numbers did not exist.  I went by appearance and got lucky
customer_reviews.text: Never changed this before. YouTube was beneficial. Largely intuitive. 30 minutes I was riding the bike and shifting gears.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke when adjusting at install
customer_reviews.text: Broke when adjusting at install. Th adjustment screw does not seat into the cheap plastic housing and pulled out
customer_reviews.author: MontyPython

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I put it on my Mongoose Excursion the bike got stolen so I haven't had much time to be able to judge who is good or bad
customer_reviews.author: John  lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Great Seller
customer_reviews.text: The product was as described and shown, also fast shipper, no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: PJS

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Shimano really are the best. Too quality for bargain bin price. An excellent and cheap derailleur that came very quicky, good job selller.
customer_reviews.author: Pacman

customer_reviews.title: This great for wheelie and stunt riding not so much for real mountain biking
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and if i can do it anybody can I ma only 11 this very easy to I dtall
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Good upgrade for old bike.
customer_reviews.text: Good hardware for a good price. Rebuilding a old Trek 800 mtb. Great fit and function.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Only works 6 speeds.
customer_reviews.text: Supposed to be 7/8 speed, but won't go to the smallest gear, so 6 speed only for me.
customer_reviews.author: oldfashionedgirl

customer_reviews.title: Top quality and a perfect match
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect replacement for my derailleur ruined in a wreck.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Coon

customer_reviews.title: Believe it or not this one works better than the original that came on the bike.Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Believe it or not this one works better than the original that came on the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Rockerboy

customer_reviews.title: Installed without issues and works as expected
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for the factory derailleur that came with my 2013 Fuji Nevada mountain bike. The new derailleur installed with no issues and works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: easy to install and a perfect fit. My grand daughter is very happy
customer_reviews.author: Molnic

customer_reviews.title: Great derailleur
customer_reviews.text: This derailleur is one of the best ! It shifts smooth as glass and the shimano tourney mega range freewheel 34T does work on this derailleur. Outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: Cape Cod

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: It was not easy to install, but I had never done one before. If you are changing one out, take pictures of the old one before removing it.
customer_reviews.author: george pichel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: No issues or set backs, it was an exact fit and work with my 7 spd ahimano set up with out any adjustments. Perfect., Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Bike repair
customer_reviews.text: It was fairly easy to install and adjust! Works great, like new bike now
customer_reviews.author: Martha Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I replaced broken Shimano deraileur. Easy to install. It does what it is supposed to do. It's been only 2 weeks, I don't know about durability, yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sang H. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great value and easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: Came as advertised! Easy to install and great value overall
customer_reviews.author: christopher m scanlon

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Yup, yup. Went on and replaced the old one with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: DeadRun01

customer_reviews.title: mountain bike rear gears
customer_reviews.text: what I needed to get my bike back on the road
customer_reviews.author: jjm

customer_reviews.title: Direct replacment
customer_reviews.text: Had one on my bike stock and yes with no clutch it is very basic, but very little adjustment installing and shifts very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent anagarola

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like this Shimano Tourney 7/8-Speed Mountain Bicycle derailleur very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: No step by step instructions included
customer_reviews.text: Though not exact replacement part for my son’s bike, it fit like new. This is for those with experience or some mechanical inclination,as no installation instructions are included.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Lundin

customer_reviews.title: Great part, terrible shipping
customer_reviews.text: Part was perfect, exactly what I needed. Amazon’s own shipping service is the WORST though. Didn’t arrive anywhere near when promised
customer_reviews.author: Eli Gabriella

customer_reviews.title: Authentic
customer_reviews.text: Authentic part. Got it installed at a bike shop and it has worked great for a month now
customer_reviews.author: Andre Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I like it and it's easy to install on mountian bike
customer_reviews.author: Frank Thomas Jr

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: Expected an adequate item for a good price. Got an excellent product for an amazing price!
customer_reviews.author: Scrapie

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: It’s not the ‘TX’ model. Doesn’t fit the bike at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna M Spenley

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy.
customer_reviews.text: This ended up being a perfect match for the Lowe rear shifter. Super easy to install by one person with no special tools.
customer_reviews.author: Jwalsh3rd

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Total trash, I've broken two of them already.. snapped clean off.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: On time
customer_reviews.text: It change gears ok but how was designed when it’s on the softest gear it tends to touch the spoke
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy man
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery 3 days installed it and adjusted working in 30 min
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as a replacement
customer_reviews.text: I was able to swap out this product for this same one.
customer_reviews.author: G and M and V and J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Durable. Holds up to 2 teenage boys on their mountain bike
customer_reviews.author: MontanaCrumb

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: I Ride a DiamondBack Outlook and After a Year of Hard Riding the Derailleur Finally failed and this is the Same Exact Thing. I've Been Riding it with the New Derailleur for 4 Months now and its Still going Strong with the Occasional Readjusting the Cable (which is to be expected with any Derailleur or anything else on a Bike). But it is Worth Every Penny and will Buy it again When I Smash my Current one on another Rock. (Last Photo is the Original that Broke)
customer_reviews.author: Norma Burpee

customer_reviews.title: Great if you dont mind it being heavy and bulky
customer_reviews.text: Heavy when compared to Deore LX, XT and XTR parts. I think they should have just stick with those lines of parts. I never installed the part and elected to buy a used XT part for a couple of dollars more. I am sure this part will perform well, but I will keep it as a spare and look to lightening it
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Works great after getting adjustment's made
customer_reviews.text: Works great after getting adjustment's made. Works a lot better than what came on the bike smooth shifts no noise
customer_reviews.author: Junk

customer_reviews.title: Works great as expected
customer_reviews.text: Works great as expected. I let a pro put it on since I have no idea what the hell I'm doing :)
customer_reviews.author: Pete Marsden

customer_reviews.title: Tried and true derailleur
customer_reviews.text: Holds up to abuse. Easy to install and adjust. Probably the better of the rear derailleur for 7/8 spd drivetrains.
customer_reviews.author: R.G.

customer_reviews.title: But and don't worry
customer_reviews.text: good quality my second. It answers me when I select the gears. It is very strong and not so easy to bend. I have it on my MTB which doesn't get the best care but the derailleur still work as new
customer_reviews.author: FDEE

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended.pick a better one.
customer_reviews.text: Part not so good. Look for the one that has the cable adjuster swivel. This one is very difficult to align and get to change gears. This review is from a technical person whom rides 100 miles per week. Every week. Keep checking don't get this one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Klein

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: smooth shifter accidentally gave a don't like it review earlier Great product
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a quick fix on a cheaper MTB
customer_reviews.text: With the right tools (chain breaker), nothing that a semi-novice bike mechanic can't handle. Easy replacement for a trashed OEM version.
customer_reviews.author: robjill

product_meta.title: SHIMANO Tourney 7/8-Speed Mountain Bicycle Rear Derailleur - RD-TX800-L
product_meta.description: SHIMANO's Double Servo-Panta Mechanism enables the rear derailleur to move in an optimum path. The guide pulley tracks the cogs closely while moving front to back, optimizing each shift. Perfect tracking contributes to the most accurate SIS shift ing.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
